name: Hello World
author: Aria Templates team
description: A sample to show and document how to write plugins for Aria Templates.

name: Calendar Widget
author: Aria Templates team
description: A highly configurable widget to create a web-based calendar to display and manage events with several view modes (day, week).

name: Light Widgets Library
author: Aria Templates team
description: A library of light widgets decoupled from the skinning system of Aria Templates and from the aria widget library. It introduces 5 new widgets: Autocomplete, Calendar, DateField, DatePicker and TextInput.

name: Carousel Widget
author: Aria Templates team
description: A simple and configurable carousel widget, as used on http://ariatemplates.com.

name: Table Template
author: Aria Templates team
description: A table template plugin for Aria Templates.
